snippet: An Antiterrorism Court in Lahore sentenced Hafiz Imran to death on Wednesday in the kidnapping of the American aid worker Warren Weinstein.
abstract: Antiterrorism Court in Lahore, Pakistan, sentences Hafiz Imran to death in 2011 kidnapping of American aid worker Warren Weinstein, who has not been released.
lead_paragraph: An Antiterrorism Court in Lahore sentenced Hafiz Imran to death on Wednesday in the kidnapping of the American aid worker Warren Weinstein.

headline.main: Pakistan: Court Condemns American’s Kidnapper to Death
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Court Condemns American’s Kidnapper to Death
